ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet -Reply
ygData.msgSnippet: I wholeheartedly agree, but I didn t want to get into grouping tactics, and open up another can -o- worms.  My point was DoT s take a long time compared to
ygData.messageBody:
I wholeheartedly agree, but I didn't want to get into grouping tactics, and open up another can -o- worms. My point was DoT's take a long time compared to burn, burn,
burn. This is definitely more important in a multi-mob situation where time is a critical factor, or the tanks will take a lot more of hits. I can med 1/2 my mana
faster than they can med 1/2 of their HP's.


Fraser G Heath wrote:

> From: "Fraser G Heath" <fheath@...>
>
> >>> mstokes <mstokes@...> 14/May/1999 03:29pm >>>
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
> " Don't look at mana to damage
> ratios, look at damage to time ratios. That is the important stat because the
> quicker the mob is dead, the less down time the group has,"
>
> Just a quick note..when were outta mana group does have a lot of down time then..unless they carry on and we just med..so, it is important to look at mana ratio also..
>
